name: Paint The Floor Red
description:
The year is 2041. There's a lot of people in the world. Resources are dwindling, and unemployment is at an all time high. What's the solution?

Welcome to PAINT THE FLOOR RED, a brand new game show! One lucky volunteer will get to decide who lives and who dies by fighting them to the death! Earn money by covering the floor in the blood of your enemies as quickly as possible, and use it to increase your health and buy weapons and special abilities to end lives faster!
